result.arabic_text: لَمۡ يَكُنِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأۡتِيَهُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَةُ
result.translation: Ba bandi bahakanye bo mu bahawe igitabo ndetse n’ababangikanyamana, ntibashobora kureka ubuhakanyi (bwabo) kugeza bagezweho n’ikimenyetso kigaragara;
